name: Madame
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: I might not be there, but don't worry, I have a free property in your <3, Thenks for making my WORLD BEAUTIFUL;)
textInChatBox: How to fix her mood!! Argh! Ashfiya's mood...!!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are my favorite creature! My cutest! Begum Jaan nooo ❤️
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click here, if you want to watch it again.
